Title: Increases the number of supreme court justices in the third judicial district (Albany, Columbia, Greene, Rensselaer, Schoharie, Sullivan & Ulster Counties)
Summary: Increases the number of supreme court justices from 15 to 17 in the third judicial district (Albany, Columbia, Greene, Rensselaer, Schoharie, Sullivan & Ulster counties).
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to increasing the number of supreme court justices in the third judicial district (Albany, Columbia, Greene, Rensselaer, Schoharie, Sullivan and Ulster counties)
